name: Slug Blast
description: Slug Blast is an explosive action-packed top-down shooter about an astronauts, who crashed on alien slug infested planet.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Video Card with OpenGL support Storage: 150 MB available space
